metadata.synopsis: One-liner for the Civilian2 from the Heapside Kitchen Helper Vignette.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the female civilian1 behind the backdoor of the Elfsong tavern's kitchen.

0.speaker: Harissa Chopeta
0.text: Sorry. I'm just so hungry. This is the only place I can get anything to eat.
0.context: NodeContext: Tentatively; a little scared of the player

1.speaker: Harissa Chopeta
1.text: Oh. Sorry. I'm just waiting for some food. Then I'll get out of your way.
1.context: NodeContext: Tentatively; a little scared of the player
